title: Quick on the Trigger Trivia Bot!
description: You're receiving this message because used the `!help` command! Below are the list of commands, rules, and details for the Trigger Trivia Game. Please read everything over carefully and good luck!

fields.name: Commands
fields.value: Please type `!commands` for the list of commands.

fields.name: Rules
fields.value:
1. Every hour, the bot will send a trivia question relating to any of the anime produced by Studio Trigger. Keep an eye out on the `#Quick-on-the-Trigger` channel! 

2. When the question is announced, DM the bot your answer (case-insensitive) using the `!answer` command. An example would be `!answer my answer here`. **You will have 3 attempts for each question, and each attempt will be counted towards the current question**, so answer carefully! This means that you cannot answer a question that was asked previously.

3. When each question is finished, players who answered correctly will earn 1 point. 

4. When all rounds are finished, the contestants with the highest score will be entered into a raffle to win a prize. Winners will be announced on the `#Quick-on-the-Trigger` channel and will receive a DM from the bot.

fields.name: How do I join?
fields.value: You can join anytime with the `!join` command. When you join, you will be assigned the `QoT` role and be pinged whenever the a question is announced. When you feel like you have the answer, type `!answer your answer here` and you'll automatically start playing!

fields.name: How do I quit?
fields.value: If you no longer wish to be pinged and want to stop playing, DM the bot `!quit`. This will remove the `QoT` role, but your details will be saved if you wish to join back. If you wish to join back, you will need to DM `!join` again.
